Rimini, Azure - Roller Blind (247blinds)

The pale blue of the rimini in azure will make you see bright white clouds the more you look at it. It really is the colour of that blue sky we hope to wake up to every day, and with this in your room, you might just be able to fool yourself. Nestle amongst white walls and pale woods to really emulate that outdoors feel, or pair with sunny yellows to create a pretty, cheerful atmosphere. Perfect for waking up to in a bedroom or a subtly coloured nursery; or for a cool, clean look in a contemporary dining room.

from £7.39

Rimini, Turquoise - Roller Blind (247blinds)

The bright aqua of the rimini in turquoise gives a cheery and contemporary look to a window. The smooth fabric is hardy enough to keep out the brighter sun rays, yet lightweight enough to allow a little light to still penetrate through. Pair with greens and browns for a fun, jungle theme, or with stark whites and pale, ice blues for a striking look and a cool, fresh atmosphere. This is perfect for a current, clean look in a bedroom or as part of an aquatic look in a bathroom.

Rimini, Powder Blue - Roller Blind (247blinds)

Rimini's powder blue is a cool, icy hue that brings a clean, fresh vibe to any room it's used in. Offering privacy whilst still allowing plenty of light through, you'll have no concerns about shadows or darkness in your room when it's closed. Complement navy blues, aqua shades, and deep sapphires to create a neat, coordinated look in a bedroom or living room. It will also work beautifully with bright whites for a subtle, crisp style that's perfect for a modern kitchen or bathroom.

Day & Night Effortless Royal Blue (Make My Blinds)

Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

If you want to create your very own country bolthole, why not combine mulberry blue with a sanded down wooden floor, some cracked leather couches, and a log burner on a slate hearth? Add these touches one by one, and you'll have the sitting room you never want to leave.

Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

blueblue-cellularblue-cellular-perfect-fitblue-perfect-fitcellularcellular-perfect-fitperfect-fit

A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.

Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their splash indigo blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this electric roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.

Sio Marmo Blue Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

The sio marmo electric roller blind with its jewel green and gold fabric print is sure to bring an exotic touch to your decor. The design is delicate yet impactful thanks to the rich and luxurious colours. With its remote, electric control, this roller blind is a practical option for hard to reach windows and ideal for rooms that require a little luxury. Product id: db-erbx2029 fabric colour: marmo blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes sio marmo blue electric roller blind in blue.

Meadow Nightingale Blue Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

The meadow nightingale electric roller blind is decorated with a white floral motif on blue and creates a contrasting effect that will look so striking in situ. The fabric is pollergen treated and can be raised and lowered with ease thanks to the electric remote control, making this blind such a convenient update to any family space. Product id: db-erbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes meadow nightingale blue electric roller blind in blue.

Their flair range is a beautiful fabric with a fresh floral pattern to transform your home. See your room in bloom with an attractive flair aqua roller blind. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. The avoca capella electric roller blind boasts a charming print in a classic colour combination of grey and blue. This soft and cool graphic will sit easily in either a contemporary or more traditional interior. This sleek fabric blind is operated via electric control so that adjusting your window covering is even easier. Whitby Blackout Pvc Navy Blue Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Whitby pvc blackout navy blue is a fabulous boys blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space. The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water.

Quackers Pvc Blackout Blue Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Instantly add something fun and quirky with quackers pvc blackout blue electric roller blind. It's is made of moisture resistant fabric so is ideal for a childrens room or bathroom, it features a selection of amusing rubber duckies sitting on top of blue pebbles. The flame retardant electric blind operation makes it easy to open and close and with blackout fabric, the children wont be disturbed by early morning light.

Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this electric roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.
